attributes.action: Hold Cardiff Council to account over the Christmas tree fiasco.
attributes.background:
They countered critisism that they were buying a fake tree and that they were buying it from China by saying it would be spectacular. Twice the height of the Angel of the North and taller than Christ the Redeemer in Rio!

It's forty feet not 40 metres!

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Cardiff City Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.
